title: So about in-game voice chat.
body: Since we're getting a new client, and it was written in an Ask Riot that we would likely get one when that happened, I was wondering what the standing on that was.

replies.body:
It will either be really good or really bad for League depending on how they implement it.
I suggest each player has a choice in their client settings whether to enable voice chat in-game or not so people who can't deal with the supposed "raging kids" that will inhabit this system won't have to deal with them.
